ingredients: +   1/2 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons margarine, 2  eggs, beaten, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 10  Italian plums, halved and pitted
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 7%, Saturated Fat 1g 6%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 153mg 7%, Total Carbohydrate 44g 16%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 31g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 5mg 26%, Calcium 36mg 3%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 118mg 3%
